answers.answer: Hi!If you have a scab and foul smell around your vaginal area, then this can be due to fungal or bacterial infection or due to bacterial vaginosis. STTI/STD can start even months after asexual contact, so if you have been sexually active, and had unprotected sex, then possibility needs to be ruled out.A foul smelling discharge from vagina can be due to bacterial vaginosis, candidia infection, or STDs like trichomoniasis etc. It can also be due to inflammation of the cervix or cervicitis. Foreign body in vagina like lodged condom, forgotten tampon can also be the cause. Diabetes too can increase the chances of vaginal infections and foul smelling discharge. You will need to consult a gynecologist to get the vaginal discharge tested through swab tests and PAP smears. It is difficult to find the cause on net. Correct treatment will follow correct diagnosis. Take care!

question: I have a red pusey scab on the side of my  leg my vagina  and it hurts when I touch it and when thing rub on it  , and it smells really bad down there too, WHAT DO I DO , is something wrong with meThe last time I had sex was last month on 29th and I dont think its a STI but I have gone to the doctors either im to ashamedCONUSED 16yr old GIRL
title: CONFUSED
